commit message: Added icon for the SwiFTP logo
Updated version name and build for Android 1.6 to allow for tablet sized screens.  Also added the external storage write permission that comes is required for the v1.6 SDK.
Widget added, with the ability to switch SwiFTP On/Off.
Somehow Subclipse has forgotten the widget_provider.xml - a describtion file of '\Swiftp\SwiFTP\src\org\swiftp\WidgetProvider.java'
Send and receive broadcast when ftp server connects
Work correctly even when no wifi network
Put server into its own namespace
Makes the gui look good an both phone and tablet
Went from SVN to git, no longer need upload script
Reworked strings, application label: FTP Server
